trans-unit.note: Action/button to add database to the app

trans-unit.id: KeePass database should not be used as key file. Please pick a different file.

Placeholder shown when there are no database files available
Settings switch: whether to include backup copies in the file list
Copyright notice

Action which resets the app as if it was just installed.
Confirmation message before resetting the app to just-installed state.
Hint/Description why the user is asked to provide their fingerprint. Shown in the standard Touch ID prompt.
Call to action in the passcode input dialog.
Action: change keyboard type to enter alphanumeric passphrases
Action: change keyboard type to enter PIN numbers
Type of keyboard to show for App Lock passcode: letters and digits.
Type of keyboard to show for App Lock passcode: digits only (PIN code).

trans-unit.source: Your organization requires a more complex passcode.
trans-unit.target: Ihre Organisation benötigt einen komplexeren Passcode.

trans-unit.target: Schützen Sie KeePassium vor unbefugten Zugriffen
trans-unit.note: Call to action in the passcode input dialog.
Action/button to switch from TouchID/FaceID prompt to manual input of the AppLock passcode.
Action/button to modify the existing AppLock passcode.
Notification that the modified AppLock passcode has been saved.
Action/button to save new or edited AppLock passcode.
Action/button to unlock the App Lock with passcode
Section in settings: icon for the app
Section in settings: icons for database
Short name of the default/system font. For example: `Font: Default`
Title of a setting option: font
Title of a setting option: font size
Group of settings for user interface appearance (text size, icons, etc)

trans-unit.id: [AutoFill/Premium/Upgrade/Manual/text] To upgrade, please manually open KeePassium from your home screen.
trans-unit.source: To upgrade, please manually open KeePassium from your home screen.
trans-unit.target: Um zu aktualisieren, öffnen Sie bitte KeePassium manuell von Ihrem Home-Bildschirm aus.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when AutoFill cannot automatically open the main app for upgrading to a premium version.
Title of a message related to upgrading to the premium version
Name of biometric authentication method. Trademarked, do not translate unless Apple traslated it to your language.
Name of biometric authentication method. Trademarked, do not translate unless Apple traslated it to your language.
Error message when the challenge-response communication has been cancelled by the user.
Error message when the hardware key is not plugged in.

trans-unit.source: Hardware keys are not available in AutoFill.
trans-unit.target: Hardwareschlüssel sind in AutoFill nicht verfügbar.
trans-unit.note: Error message when trying to use challenge-response hardware in AutoFill.

trans-unit.source: Hardware keys are not supported by this database format.
trans-unit.target: Hardwareschlüssel werden von diesem Datenbankformat nicht unterstützt.
trans-unit.note: Error message when trying to use challenge-response with a kdb database.

trans-unit.source: This device or iOS version does not support hardware keys (%@)
trans-unit.target: Hardwareschlüssel werden von diesem Gerät oder dieser iOS-Version nicht unterstützt (%@)
trans-unit.note: Error message when trying to use a hardware challenge-response key on unsupported device/iOS version. %@ will be the name of the hardware interface, such as `NFC` or `Lightning`.

trans-unit.source: Hardware key is not configured for challenge-response.
trans-unit.note: Error message: the hardware key (or its slot) was not configured for challenge-response operations.
Progress status
Progress status
Action copy some named value to clipboard. For example: `Copy Password`. [valueName: String]
Notification: an item has been copied to clipboard
Subtitle for `Contact Us`. Keep it short.
Error message about AES cipher. [errorCode: Int]
Error message about AES cipher. [errorCode: Int]
Error message about AES cipher. [errorCode: Int]
Error message about Argon2 hashing function. [errorCode: Int]
Error message about key derivation function (KDF) parameters. [kdfName: String, paramName: String]
Error message about PKCS7 padding. [errorCode: Int]
Error message about random number generator. [errorCode: Int]
Error message about Twofish cipher. [errorCode: Int]

trans-unit.id: [Database/Add] Selected file "%@" does not look like a database.
trans-unit.source: Selected file "%@" does not look like a database.
trans-unit.target: Die ausgewählte Datei "%@" sieht nicht wie eine Datenbank aus.
trans-unit.note: Warning when trying to add a random file as a database. [fileName: String]
Action/button to create a new database
Action: download icon of a website
Action/button to download favicons of websites mentioned in selected entries.
Report of favicon download results.
Status message: multiple website favicons are being downloaded
Status message: a website favicon is being downloaded
Action: add/import an image as a custom icon

trans-unit.id: [Database/Delete/Confirm/text] Delete database file? Make sure you have a backup.
trans-unit.source: Delete database file? Make sure you have a backup.
trans-unit.target: Datenbankdatei löschen? Stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie ein Backup haben.
trans-unit.note: Message to confirm deletion of a database file. (This deletes the file itself)
Action to modify database encryption settings.
Parameter name in database encryption settings. Example: 'Encryption Algorithm: AES-256'
Parameter name in database encryption settings. Defines the number of times/iterations a calculation (transform) should be executed. Example: 'Transform Rounds: 100'
Parameter name in database encryption settings. This is a term, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Key_derivation_function. Example: 'Key Derivation Function: Argon2'

trans-unit.source: High memory requirements can make this database incompatible with Password AutoFill.
trans-unit.target: Hohe Speicheranforderungen können das autom. Ausfüllen von Passwörtern für die Datenbank deaktivieren.
trans-unit.note: Warning for too high value of the `Memory usage` parameter in database encryption settings.
Parameter name in database encryption settings. Defines the amount of memory that should be used by an algorithm. Example: 'Memory Usage: 16 MB'
Action/button button in database encryption settings. Resets the settings to recommended values.
Parameter name in database encryption settings. Defines the number of computations to run in parallel/simultaneously. Example: 'Parallelism: 2 threads'
Title: database encryption settings.

trans-unit.source: This entry points to another database.
trans-unit.target: Dieser Eintrag verweist auf eine andere Datenbank.
trans-unit.note: Info message for entries that contain information for opening a different database.
Status message: checking if currently loaded database is the latest version
Status message: failed to check if currently loaded database is the latest version
Status message: currently loaded database is the latest version
Notification message about external changes to the loaded file.

trans-unit.source: All your data will be preserved.
trans-unit.note: Info message when changing database file format.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium needs to upgrade your database file format (from %1$@ to %2$@). You might need to update other apps that use this database.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium muss das Dateiformat Ihrer Datenbank aktualisieren (von %1$@ auf %2$@). Möglicherweise müssen Sie auch andere Anwendungen aktualisieren, die diese Datenbank verwenden.
trans-unit.note: Info message when the app needs to change database file format. [oldFormat, newFormat: String]
Title of an info message when the app needs to change database file format.
Title of an icon collection: icons provided by the system
Status of a database item (entry or group) after it was edited.

trans-unit.source: This is an older database format, some data might be lost.
trans-unit.target: Dies ist ein älteres Datenbankformat, wodurch einige Daten verloren gehen können.
trans-unit.note: Notification when user tries to copy data from KDBX to older KDB database.

trans-unit.source: If some local files are not listed, launch the main KeePassium app first.
trans-unit.target: Wenn einige lokale Dateien nicht aufgeführt sind, starten Sie zunächst die Hauptapp von KeePassium.
trans-unit.note: Recommendation for solving a problem with a list of files.
Title of the database picker list

trans-unit.source: This database is protected by your corporate IT policies and Microsoft Intune.
trans-unit.target: Diese Datenbank ist durch Ihre unternehmenseigenen IT-Richtlinien und Microsoft Intune geschützt.
trans-unit.note: Error message
Error message
Error message
Error message
Error message
Error message, when the real file format is recognized. For example: 'Incorrect database format: JPEG.'

trans-unit.id: [Database/Load/Error] Please provide at least a password or a key file
trans-unit.source: Please provide at least a password or a key file
trans-unit.target: Bitte nutzen Sie mindestens ein Passwort oder eine Schlüsseldatei
trans-unit.note: Error shown when both master password and key file are empty
Error message

trans-unit.source: The database is unreachable. This is its latest local copy.
trans-unit.target: Die Datenbank ist unerreichbar. Dies ist ihre letzte lokale Kopie.
trans-unit.note: Message shown after we show a cached local database instead of the (unavailable) original database.

trans-unit.target: Die Datenbank kann nur gelesen werden
trans-unit.note: Message shown if current database cannot be edited
Status message: loading a database
Action/button: change master key of a database.

trans-unit.source: If you ever forget it, you won't be able to access your data. There is no password reset option.
trans-unit.target: Falls Sie es einmal vergessen, können Sie nicht mehr auf Ihre Daten zugreifen. Es gibt keine Option zum Zurücksetzen des Passworts.
trans-unit.note: A warning shown when changing database password. Is preceded with `Remember your database password`.
Imperative/recommendation: title of a warning when changing database password.
Notification after changing database master key
Glossary term: noun, a master key for encrypting the database
Title of database creation dialog
Action/button
Action: lock database
Action: ignore warnings and proceed to work with the database

trans-unit.target: Die Datenbank wurde zuletzt bearbeitet von: %@
trans-unit.note: Status message: name of the app that was last to write/create the database file. [lastUsedAppName: String]

trans-unit.id: [Database/Opened/Warning/title] Your database is ready, but there was an issue.
trans-unit.source: Your database is ready, but there was an issue.
trans-unit.target: Ihre Datenbank wurde geöffnet, aber es gab ein Problem.
trans-unit.note: Title of a warning message, shown after opening a problematic database
Action/button to lock current database (the next time, it will ask for the master key).
Title of a list with database-related actions (e.g. lock database, change master key, etc)
Status message: preparing database print preview.
Database loading/saving status: checking whether our database was modified from another device.
Database loading status: fetching the database file from disk/cloud
Database saving status: making a local backup copy of the database
Database loading/saving status: replacing field references with their values
Database saving status: deciding how to handle conflicting changes.
Progress status
Database saving status
Progress status: finished loading database
Progress status

trans-unit.source: Try connecting to your remote storage directly from KeePassium.
trans-unit.target: Versuchen Sie, sich direkt von KeePassium aus mit Ihrem Remote-Speicher zu verbinden.
trans-unit.note: Suggested solution/call to action when intermediate sync app fails.
Action/button

trans-unit.id: [Database/Remove/Confirm/text] Remove database from the list? The file will remain intact and you can add it again later.
trans-unit.source: Remove database from the list? The file will remain intact and you can add it again later.
trans-unit.target: Datenbank aus der Liste entfernen? Die Datei bleibt erhalten und Sie können sie später erneut hinzufügen.
trans-unit.note: Message to confirm removal of database file from the app. (This keeps the file, but removes its reference from the app.)
Action/button to save the current database.
Action/button to save file to a remote server.
Status message: finished saving a database
Status message: saving a database
File settings parameter: time after which file will be considered unreachable. Example: `Consider File Unreachable: in 10 seconds`.)
File settings parameter: what to do when file was changed by another app/device. (For example: `Database Modified Externally: Don't check`)
File settings parameter: what to do when file was changed by another app/device. (For example: `Database Modified Externally: Notify`)
File settings parameter: what to do when file was changed by another app/device. (For example: `Database Modified Externally: Reload Automatically`)
File settings parameter: what to do when file was changed by another app/device. (For example: `Database Modified Externally: Notify`)
Title: what to do when a cloud-stored file cannot be loaded. (For example: `If File is Unreachable: Re-add File`.)
Title: what to do when (remote) file cannot be loaded. (For example: `If File is Unreachable: Show Error`.)
Title: what to do when (remote) file cannot be loaded. (For example: `If File is Unreachable: Use Local Copy`.)
File settings parameter: what to do when (remote) file cannot be loaded. (For example: `If File is Unreachable: Use Local Copy`.)
Title of settings section (read-only, backup-able, etc)
File setting title, whether the file can be modified (yes/no).
Title of database-related settings screen
Action/button to switch from current to some other database.

trans-unit.source: Cancel saving, leave target file intact.
trans-unit.target: Brechen Sie den Speichervorgang ab und lassen Sie die Zieldatei unverändert.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of the database sync conflict `Cancel` option.
Action: combine changes in two conflicting databases.

trans-unit.target: Führen Sie die Änderungen vor dem Speichern zusammen.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of the database sync conflict `Merge` option.

trans-unit.source: Overwrite target file with the local version.
trans-unit.target: Überschreiben Sie die Zieldatei mit der lokalen Version.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of the database sync conflict `Overwrite` option.

trans-unit.target: Speichern Sie die Änderungen in einer anderen Datei.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of the database sync conflict `Save as` option.
Title: the current (on-server) database version in case of sync conflict.

trans-unit.source: The database has changed since it was loaded in KeePassium.
trans-unit.target: Die Datenbank hat sich geändert, seit sie in KeePassium geladen wurde.
trans-unit.note: Message shown in case of database sync conflict.
Title: the loaded (on-device) database version in case of sync conflict.
Title of a message shown when saving to a database that has already been modified elsewhere.
Error message

trans-unit.source:
Attachments of some entries are missing data. This is a sign of database corruption, most likely by the last used app (%1$@). KeePassium will preserve the empty attachments, but cannot restore them. You should restore your database from a backup copy.
Missing attachments: %2$@
trans-unit.target:
Anhänge einiger Einträge zeigen auf fehlende Daten. Dies ist ein Zeichen einer Datenbankkorruption, höchstwahrscheinlich von der zuletzt verwendeten App (%1$@). KeePassium wird die leeren Anhänge bewahren, kann sie aber nicht wiederherstellen. Sie sollten Ihre Datenbank aus einer Backup-Kopie wiederherstellen.
Fehlende Anhänge: %2$@
trans-unit.note: A warning about missing attachments after loading the database. [lastUsedAppName: String, attachmentNames: String]

trans-unit.source:
Some entries have attachments without a name. This is a sign of previous database corruption.
Please review attached files in the following entries (and their history): %@
trans-unit.target:
Einige Einträge haben Anhänge ohne Namen. Dies ist ein Zeichen für frühere Datenbankkorruption.
Bitte überprüfen Sie die angehängten Dateien in den folgenden Einträgen (und deren Verlauf): %@
trans-unit.note: A warning about nameless attachments, shown after loading the database. [listOfEntryNames: String]

trans-unit.source:
Some entries have custom field(s) with empty names. This can be a sign of data corruption. Please check these entries:
%@
trans-unit.target:
Einige Einträge haben benutzerdefinierte Felder mit leeren Namen. Dies kann ein Zeichen für Datenverlust sein. Bitte überprüfen Sie folgende Einträge:
%@
trans-unit.note: A warning about misformatted custom fields after loading the database. [entryPaths: String]

trans-unit.source: The database contains some attachments that are not used in any entry. Most likely, they have been forgotten by the last used app (%@). However, this can also be a sign of data corruption. Please make sure to have a backup of your database before changing anything.
trans-unit.target: Die Datenbank enthält einige Anhänge, die in keinem Eintrag verwendet werden. Wahrscheinlich wurden sie von der letzten App (%@) vergessen. Dies kann aber auch ein Zeichen von Datenverlust sein. Bitte stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie eine Sicherung Ihrer Datenbank haben, bevor Sie etwas ändern.
trans-unit.note: A warning about unused attachments after loading the database. [lastUsedAppName: String]
Progress bar status: un-zipping the database content
Progress bar status
Progress bar status: parsing decrypted XML content
Progress bar status
Progress bar status
Progress bar status

Error message about XML parsing. [tag: String]
Error message about XML parsing. [actualTag: String]
Error message about XML parsing. [actualTag: String, expectedTag: String]
Generic error while parsing XML. [errorDetails: String]

Name of an entry field
Name of an entry field
Name of an entry field

Name of an entry field

Status message: loading file to be attached to an entry
Expiry Date of an entry which does not expire.

Title of a field with date and time when the entry will no longer be valid. 'Never' is also a possible value

trans-unit.source: '%@' is located in Recently Deleted and might be deleted soon. To preserve your data, move the file to a more permanent location.
trans-unit.target: '%@' befindet sich in „Zuletzt gelöscht“ gelöscht und könnte bald gelöscht werden. Um Ihre Daten zu bewahren, verschieben Sie die Datei an einen dauerhafteren Ort.
trans-unit.note: Warning shown when opening files from Recycle Bin location. Translation of 'Recently Deleted' should match that in the Files app. [fileName: String]

trans-unit.id: [File/PermissionDenied] Try to remove the file from the app, then add it again.
trans-unit.source: Try to remove the file from the app, then add it again.
trans-unit.target: Versuchen Sie die Datei aus der App zu entfernen und fügen Sie sie erneut hinzu.
trans-unit.note: A suggestion shown after specific file errors (either databases or key files).
Action: re-add (a broken) database or key file to the app.

trans-unit.source: This is a temporary backup database. It can be automatically deleted without a warning. Don't use it as your main database.
trans-unit.target: Dies ist eine temporäre Backup-Datenbank. Sie kann ohne Vorwarnung automatisch gelöscht werden. Verwenden Sie sie nicht als Ihre Hauptdatenbank.
trans-unit.note: Notification when user opens an in-app backup database.

trans-unit.source: Storage provider is not available. Please check whether it is installed and logged in to your account.
trans-unit.target: Der Speicheranbieter ist nicht verfügbar. Bitte überprüfen Sie, ob er installiert und in Ihrem Konto angemeldet ist.
trans-unit.note: Error message: storage provider app was logged out or uninstalled.

trans-unit.source: %@ is not available. Please check whether it is installed and logged in to your account.
trans-unit.target: %@ ist nicht verfügbar. Bitte überprüfen Sie, ob der Anbieter installiert und in Ihrem Konto angemeldet ist.
trans-unit.note: Error message: storage provider app was logged out or uninstalled [fileProviderName: String].
Error message: the required network drive is not connected.
Error message: there is no USB drive connected to the device.

trans-unit.source: Access to this storage is disabled by your organization.
trans-unit.target: Der Zugriff auf diesen Speicher wurde von Ihrer Organisation deaktiviert.
trans-unit.note: Error message: organization's IT administrator has forbidden access to a data storage location.

trans-unit.source: Network access is blocked by the settings.
trans-unit.note: Error message: network access is forbidden by system or app settings.
Error message: storage provider app (e.g. Google Drive) does not respond to requests.
Error message: file provider does not respond to requests. For example: `Google Drive does not respond.`
Error message: file provider does not support write operations. For example: `Cannot save file (OneDrive)`

trans-unit.source: Microsoft has recently switched OneDrive integration with iOS to read-only mode. Temporarily, they say.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft hat kürzlich die OneDrive-Integration mit iOS auf den Nur-Lese-Modus umgestellt.
trans-unit.note: Explanation of a file writing error

trans-unit.source: Use the Export option to save file to another location.
trans-unit.target: Verwenden Sie die Export-Option, um die Datei an einem anderen Ort zu speichern.
trans-unit.note: Suggestion for error recovery

trans-unit.source: KeePassium needs your permission to access '%@'.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium benötigt Ihre Erlaubnis für den Zugriff auf '%@'.
trans-unit.note: Error message for file with an expired access permission [fileName: String].

trans-unit.source: Select the file again to allow access
trans-unit.target: Wählen Sie die Datei erneut aus, um den Zugriff zu erlauben
trans-unit.note: Action/button for error recovery
Error message: storage provider app (e.g. Google Drive) does not respond to requests (quickly enough).
Error message: file provider does not respond to requests (quickly enough). For example: `Google Drive does not respond`

trans-unit.source: Internal KeePassium error, please tell us about it.
trans-unit.target: Interner KeePassium-Fehler. Bitte teilen Sie uns dies mit.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown when there's internal inconsistency in KeePassium.
Title of a setting: is the file hidden

trans-unit.source: Hidden files are less visible to a casual user, but don't improve data security.
trans-unit.target: Verborgene Dateien sind für einen gelegentlichen Benutzer weniger sichtbar, verbessern aber nicht die Datensicherheit.
trans-unit.note: Warning message for 'hidden' files.

Action: refresh list of items, usually files
Title of a search field (a noun, not verb)
Title of a menu with various utilities

Title of a screen/list view configuration: sort order, visible items, etc
Warning message template. Swap the icon and message for right-to-left languages.

Action/button to delete all relevant/selected items

Action/button to finish (editing) and keep changes

Action/button to export an item to another app
Action/button shown below error messages. Tapping the button will start the fixing/repairing workflow described in the error message.

Action/button to rename an item
Action/button to replace an item with another one

Action: repeat the previous (failed) action

Action/button to share an item with another app (AirDrop, send an email, etc)
Action/button to show additional information about an error or item
Action/button to show sensitive info as it is, in plain text (as opposed to asterisks)
Checkbox/Button to show a text field in its full size

trans-unit.id: [HardwareKey/AutoFill/NotAvailable] Hardware keys are not available in AutoFill.

trans-unit.source: These hardware keys are not available in AutoFill.

trans-unit.note: Information notice for a list of hardware keys.
Name of an input field which shows selected hardware key
Connector type for older Apple devices, used through a USB adapter. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lightning_(connector)

trans-unit.target: Erfordert Apple-Adapter für USB-C auf Lightning
trans-unit.note: A notice for hardware keys that need an adapter for physical connection to device.
A notification that NFC (Near Field Communication) interface is not supported by the current iOS version.
Master key/unlock option: don't use hardware keys
Title of a list with possible hardware key connections

trans-unit.source: This device does not support challenge-response over USB connection.
trans-unit.target: Dieses Gerät unterstützt keine Challenge-Response über eine USB-Verbindung.
trans-unit.note: Information notice. 'Challenge-response' is a glossary term.

trans-unit.source: USB is not available, because this is an iPad app running on macOS. Use the native Mac app instead.
trans-unit.target: USB ist nicht verfügbar, da dies eine iPad-App ist, die unter macOS läuft. Verwenden Sie stattdessen die native Mac-App.
trans-unit.note: Information notice
Master key/unlock option: use given slot of YubiKey
Generic title of in-app help article

trans-unit.source: To protect its data, your organization needs to manage this app. To complete this action, sign in with your work or school account.
trans-unit.target: Um die eigenen Daten zu schützen, muss Ihre Organisation diese App verwalten. Melden Sie sich mit Ihrem Geschäfts-, Schul- oder Unikonto an, um diese Aktion abzuschließen.
trans-unit.note: Info message for enterprise users

trans-unit.source: KeePassium version for personal use is available on the App Store.
trans-unit.target: Die KeePassium-Version für den persönlichen Gebrauch ist erhältlich im App Store.
trans-unit.note: Info message for users who accidentally installed the enterprise version.
Notification that an archived/historical item (e.g entry) has been successfully restored
Title of a list with advanced/expert-level properties of a database item (e.g. entry)
Title of a setting: whether the item (e.g. entry) should be used in AutoFill feature. App-specific setting for KeePassXC.
Possible value of the `Password AutoFill` setting. For example: 'Password AutoFill: Allowed'
Possible value of the `Password AutoFill` setting. For example: 'Password AutoFill: Disabled'
Title of a setting: whether the item (e.g. entry) should be used in AutoFill feature
Possible value of the `Password Audit` setting. For example: 'Password Audit: Allowed'
Possible value of the `Password Audit` setting. For example: 'Password Audit: Disabled'
Title of a setting: whether the item (e.g. entry) should be included in password audit
Possible value of the `Search` setting. Example: 'Search: Allowed'
Possible value of the `Search` setting, when the item should be excluded from search results. Example: 'Search: Disabled'
Title of a setting: whether the item (e.g. entry) should be considered during search. Example: 'Search: Allowed'
Default value of an item property. For example: 'Password Audit: Inherit from parent group (Allowed)'. [inheritedValue: String]
Title of a list with item (e.g. entry) properties/settings, such as searchability, auto-typing, etc
Name of an entry/group category (visual style): default one, like in KeePass
Title of a list with custom (user-imported) icons for groups and entries
Title of a list with standard/default icons for groups and entries
Status message: processing of the master key is in progress
Action: create new key file.
Default name for new key files. Should match the `key file` term in the glossary.

trans-unit.id: [KeyFile/Delete/Confirm/text] Delete key file? Make sure you have a backup.
trans-unit.source: Delete key file? Make sure you have a backup.
trans-unit.target: Schlüsseldatei löschen? Stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie ein Backup haben.
trans-unit.note: Message to confirm deletion of a key file.
Name of an input field which shows selected key file
Description of the `Import Key File` action.
Action: import/add a key file into the app. `Key file` is a glossary term.

trans-unit.id: [KeyFile/Remove/Confirm/text] Remove key file from the list? The file will remain intact and you can add it again later.
trans-unit.source: Remove key file from the list? The file will remain intact and you can add it again later.
trans-unit.target: Schlüsseldatei aus der Liste entfernen? Die Datei bleibt erhalten und Sie können sie später erneut hinzufügen.
trans-unit.note: Message to confirm removal of a key file from the app. (This keeps the file, but removes its reference from the app.)
Description of the `Select Key File` action.
Action: use a key file at its storage location, without importing to the app.
Error message when the key file is misformatted or damaged
Error message: unsupported/unknown format of a key file
Generic error message about system keychain. [errorCode: Int]
Error message about system keychain.
Menu item: show information about file (name, size, dates)
Notification next to the OTP code which was copied to clipboard
Name of an entry field

trans-unit.source: This QR code is not suitable for OTP setup.
trans-unit.target: Dieser QR-Code ist nicht für die OTP-Einrichtung geeignet.
trans-unit.note: Error shown when scanned QR code cannot be used for OTP

trans-unit.source: Entered secret code is not suitable for OTP setup.
trans-unit.target: Dieser Geheimcode ist nicht für die OTP-Einrichtung geeignet.
trans-unit.note: Error shown when a manually entered OTP secret is misformatted.

trans-unit.source: One-time password is already configured for this entry. Do you want to overwrite it?
trans-unit.target: Für diesen Eintrag ist bereits ein Einmalpasswort festgelegt. Möchten Sie es überschreiben?
trans-unit.note: Message to confirm user intentions
Button/action: proceed with manual OTP setup
Call to action: type in the secret key for OTP setup.
Button/action: proceed with QR code based OTP setup
Call for action. Acronym `OTP` should not be translated.
Description of an OTP code; sentence case.

trans-unit.target: Wenden Sie sich an Ihren IT-Administrator.
trans-unit.note: Suggestion/hint on how to fix an accompanying error.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium could not find the enterprise account of your organization.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium konnte das Unternehmenskonto Ihrer Organisation nicht finden.
trans-unit.note: Error message, euphemism for missing corporate license
Action/button: accept/use the generated password
Error message from the random text generator.
Description of an empty character set for password generator. 'Empty' as 'there are no characters'.
User-defined set of characters for password generator.

trans-unit.source: Increase the length parameter to at least %d.
trans-unit.target: Ändern Sie die Passwortlänge auf %d oder mehr Zeichen.
trans-unit.note: Error message/call to action from the random text generator.
Action/button: generate random text/password/phrase
Description of randomly generated text/password/phrase
Inclusion criterion for a password generator. For example: `Digits: Allowed`
Inclusion criterion for a password generator. For example: `Uppercase Letters: Excluded`
Inclusion criterion for a password generator — a disabled/inactive one that won't be taken into account. For example: `Uppercase Letters: Inactive`
Inclusion criterion for a password generator. For example: `Special Symbols: Required`
Length (number of characters) of the random text to generate

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of identical characters repeating consecutively.
trans-unit.target: Maximale Anzahl sich wiederholender identischer Zeichen.
trans-unit.note: Description of a password generator parameter. For example, the digit in 'abc222def'.

trans-unit.source: Increase the limit on maximum number of identical elements repeating consecutively.
trans-unit.target: Erhöhe das Limit für die maximale Anzahl identischer sich wiederholender Elemente.
trans-unit.note: Error message/call to action from the random text generator.
One of the operation modes of the random text generator
One of the operation modes of the random text generator
One of the operation modes of the random text generator, where it generates random phrases.
Operation mode of the random text generator (for example, `Basic`, `Expert`, `Passphrase`)

trans-unit.source: Need more elements to pick from.
trans-unit.target: Mehr Elemente zur Auswahl werden benötigt.
trans-unit.note: Error message from the random text generator.
Length (number of characters) of the password to generate

trans-unit.source: One of the character sets is both required and excluded.
trans-unit.target: Einer der Zeichensätze ist sowohl erforderlich als auch ausgeschlossen.
trans-unit.note: Error message from the random text generator. `required` and `excluded` are as in [PasswordGenerator/InclusionCondition/required] and [PasswordGenerator/InclusionCondition/excluded]
Title for digits (like '123')
Title for look-alike symbols (like '1lI', that is: digit `1`, small `L`, capital `i`).
Title for lowercase letters (like 'abc')
Title for special symbols (like '@#$')
Title for uppercase letters (like 'ABC')
Name of the space character. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space_(punctuation)
Character to be inserted between words of a passphrase.
Word capitalization style. Written in that style, if possible.
Word capitalization style: first letters of significant words capitalized. Written in that style, if possible.
Case of letters in a word (e.g. UPPER, lower, Title Case)
Word capitalization style. Written in that style, if possible.
Number of words in a generated passphrase. In context: 'Words: 5'
Name of a wordlist for passphrase generator. `EFF` is an organization name.
Name of a wordlist for passphrase generator. `EFF` is an organization name.

trans-unit.source: File could not be imported because of a problem in line %1$d (%2$@)

List of words to be used for a passphrase.

Title of a premium feature

trans-unit.note: Explanation of the premium feature
Title of a premium feature
List of premium benefits/advantages
Title of a premium feature
List of premium benefits/advantages
Call to action

Call to action: start free trial
Call to action: upgrade to premium
Action: open AppStore subscription management page

trans-unit.source: You have a perpetual license for all the versions before %@.
trans-unit.target: Sie haben eine unbefristete Lizenz für alle Versionen vor %@.
trans-unit.note: [formattedDate: String]
What's included in a price plan: 1 year of support via email
What's included in a price plan
What's included in a free plan: support via forums (as opposed to email support)
What's included in a price plan: existing premium features only (as opposed to `current + future`)
What's included in a price plan: support via email
Family Sharing programme. Translation must match Apple's: https://www.apple.com/family-sharing/
What's included in a free plan: reminders that the version is free

trans-unit.source: Premium features added in the future would require a new purchase at full price.
trans-unit.target: Premium-Funktionen, die in Zukunft hinzugefügt werden, erfordern einen Neukauf zum vollen Preis.
trans-unit.note: Upgrade conditions for current-version premium purchase.
What's included in a price plan: upcoming premium features (as opposed to `current only`)
What's included in a price plan. Please leave `perpetual fallback license` in English.

What's included in a subscription plan. By subscribing for a certain period, the user receives a permanent license for a version of the app. More info: https://keepassium.com/articles/perpetual-fallback-license/
What's included in a price plan
Price of the free pricing plan
Name of the free pricing plan
Marks the default pricing plan
Status when the user has a premium version

trans-unit.source:
Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase.
Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.
trans-unit.target:
Der Kaufpreis wird bei der Kaufbestätigung über Ihr Apple ID-Konto abgerechnet.
Das Abonnement verlängert sich automatisch, wenn es nicht mindestens 24 Stunden vor Ablauf der aktuellen Laufzeit gekündigt wird. Die Verlängerungsgebühr wird innerhalb von 24 Stunden vor Ablauf der aktuellen Laufzeit über Ihr Konto abgerechnet.
Sie können Ihre Abonnements verwalten und kündigen, indem Sie nach dem Kauf Ihre Kontoeinstellungen im App Store aufrufen.
trans-unit.note: Subscription conditions
Trial conditions. For example `30 days free, then $1 per month`

trans-unit.id: [Premium/Upgrade/Deferred/text] Thank you! You can use KeePassium while purchase is awaiting approval.
trans-unit.source: Thank you! You can use KeePassium while purchase is awaiting approval.
trans-unit.target: Vielen Dank! Sie können KeePassium verwenden, während auf die Kaufbestätigung gewartet wird.
trans-unit.note: Message shown when in-app purchase is deferred until approval (parental or corporate).
Status message when downloading available in-app purchases
Status: in-app purchase started

trans-unit.target: Kein vorheriger Kauf konnte wiederhergestellt werden.
trans-unit.note: Text of an error message: there were no in-app purchases that can be restored
Title of an error message: there were no in-app purchases that can be restored
Text of the message shown after in-app purchase was successfully restored
Title of the message shown after in-app purchase was successfully restored
Message shown after buying or subscribing.
Action/button to start choosing premium versions and possibly buying one

trans-unit.source: Please check if you need to cancel your old subscription.
trans-unit.target: Bitte überprüfen Sie, ob Sie Ihr altes Abonnement kündigen müssen.
trans-unit.note: Message shown after buying a lifetime version.
Product price for monthly premium subscription. [localizedPrice: String]
Product price for annual premium subscription. [localizedPrice: String]
Product price for once-and-forever premium. [localizedPrice: String]
Equivalent monthly price for an annual subscription. For example: `$12/year ≈ $1 / month`

trans-unit.id: [Premium/Upgrade] Hmm, there are no upgrades available. This should not happen, please contact support.
trans-unit.source: Hmm, there are no upgrades available. This should not happen, please contact support.
trans-unit.target: Hmm, es sind keine Upgrades verfügbar. Dies sollte nicht passieren, bitte kontaktieren Sie den Support.
trans-unit.note: Error message: AppStore returned no available in-app purchase options
Name of the permanent/never-ending license.
Status: special premium for beta-testing environment is active
Status: current version of the app. For example: `Current version: 1.23`. Should be similar to the `Licensed version` string. [version: String]
Status: premium subscription has expired. For example: `Expired 1 day ago`. [timeFormatted: String, includes the time unit (day, hour, minute)]
Status: licensed premium version of the app. For example: `Licensed version: 1.23`. [version: String]
Status: scheduled renewal date of a premium subscription. For example: `Next renewal on 1 Jan 2050`. [expiryDateString: String]
Status: validity period of once-and-forever premium

trans-unit.id: [Premium/usage] App being useful: %@/month, that is around %@/year.
trans-unit.source: App being useful: %1$@/month, that is around %2$@/year.
trans-unit.target: App ist nützlich: %1$@/Monat, das sind etwa %2$@/Jahr.
trans-unit.note: Status: how long the app has been used during some time period. For example: `App being useful: 1hr/month, about 12hr/year`. [monthlyUsage: String, annualUsage: String — already include the time unit (hours, minutes)]

trans-unit.source: Connect directly to enterprise storage accounts, such as OneDrive for Business.
trans-unit.target: Verbinden Sie sich direkt mit Speicherkonten von Unternehmen, wie etwa OneDrive for Business.
trans-unit.note: Description/call to action for the `Business Cloud Storage` premium feature.
Title of a premium feature: access to company's cloud accounts like 'OneDrive for Business'

trans-unit.source: Upgrade to Premium and enjoy KeePassium at its best.
trans-unit.target: Upgraden Sie auf Premium und genießen Sie KeePassium in vollen Zügen.
trans-unit.note: A generic description of a premium feature
A generic title of a premium feature

trans-unit.source: Strengthen your security with hardware keys (YubiKey) in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Erhöhen Sie Ihre Sicherheit mit Hardware-Schlüsseln (YubiKey) in der Premium-Version.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Hardware Keys` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability use hardware keys (e.g. YubiKey) for encryption (In Title Case)

trans-unit.source: Upgrade to premium and open linked databases in one step.
trans-unit.target: Upgraden Sie auf Premium und öffnen Sie in einem Schritt verknüpfte Datenbanken.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Linked Databases` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to open databases referenced in another database (In Title Case)

trans-unit.id: [PremiumFeature/MultiDB/description] Easily switch between databases in the premium version.
trans-unit.source: Easily switch between databases in the premium version.
trans-unit.target: Wechseln Sie einfach zwischen Datenbanken mit der Premium-Version.
trans-unit.note: Description/advertisement for the `Multiple Databases` premium feature
Title of a premium feature: ability to use multiple databases (In Title Case)

trans-unit.source: Find out if any of your passwords have been exposed in a known data breach.
trans-unit.target: Finden Sie heraus, ob eines Ihrer Passwörter bei einer bekannten Datenpanne preisgegeben wurde.
trans-unit.note: Description/call to action for the `Password Audit` premium feature.
Title of a premium feature: discover which passwords are known to be compromized

trans-unit.source: Fill out login forms with a single tap, without even opening KeePassium.
trans-unit.target: Füllen Sie Anmeldeformulare mit einem einzigen Fingertipp aus, ohne KeePassium überhaupt zu öffnen.
trans-unit.note: Description/call to action for the `Quick AutoFill` premium feature.
Title of a premium feature: show relevant AutoFill entries right under the input field

trans-unit.source: KeePassium does not collect any personal or analytical data nor share it with anyone.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium sammelt weder persönliche oder analytische Daten, noch teilt irgendwelche Daten mit Dritten.
trans-unit.note: A brief summary of the privacy policy (for offline mode)

trans-unit.source: KeePassium does not collect any personal or analytical data. Some features may involve data exchange with external services (on your request and for the sole purpose of making these services available to you). Such an exchange is governed by the privacy policy of the respective service.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium sammelt keine persönlichen oder analytischen Daten. Bei einigen Funktionen kann es zu einem Datenaustausch mit externen Diensten kommen (auf Ihre Anfrage hin und ausschließlich zu dem Zweck, Ihnen diese Dienste zur Verfügung zu stellen). Ein solcher Austausch unterliegt den Datenschutzrichtlinien des jeweiligen Dienstes.
trans-unit.note: A brief summary of the privacy policy (for online mode)
Section: privacy policy

trans-unit.source: Not enough memory to continue. This can happen with larger databases or too ambitious database settings (Argon2 memory parameter).
trans-unit.target: Nicht genügend Speicher, um fortzufahren. Dies kann bei größeren Datenbanken oder zu ehrgeizigen Datenbankeinstellungen (Argon2-Speicherparameter) passieren.
trans-unit.note: Error message when a long-running operation was cancelled due to the lack of free memory (RAM).
Explanation/notification when a long-running operation was cancelled by user

trans-unit.source: Quick AutoFill shows relevant entries right next to the password field, without opening KeePassium.
trans-unit.target: Schnelles autom. Ausfüllen zeigt relevante Einträge direkt neben dem Passwortfeld an, ohne KeePassium zu öffnen.
trans-unit.note: Description of the Quick AutoFill feature.
Name of a feature that shows relevant entries directly next to the login/password forms.
Network security setting
Network connection. For example `Connection: WebDAV` or `Connection: MyCloud`.
Title of a section: username, password, etc

trans-unit.source: KeePassium will communicate directly with your online storage. This ensures reliable file transfer.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium kommuniziert direkt mit Ihrem Online-Speicher. Dies gewährleistet eine zuverlässige Dateiübertragung.
trans-unit.note: Description of the `Direct connection` sync method.
Error message: user credentials rejected by the server
Network address of a file
Name of a predefined Google Drive folder which contains user's own files
Name of a predefined GoogleDrive folder which contains files shared with this user
Name of a predefined OneDrive folder which contains user's own files
Name of a predefined OneDrive folder which contains files shared with this user
Network address of a WebDAV server
Action: authenticate to Dropbox account

trans-unit.source: Dropbox needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.target: Dropbox fordert dich auf dich erneut anzumelden.
trans-unit.note: Error description: the user should manually sign in to their Dropbox account
Action: authenticate to Google Drive account

trans-unit.source: Google Drive needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.target: Sie müssen sich erneut bei Google Drive anmelden.
trans-unit.note: Error description: the user should manually sign in to their Google Drive account
Action: authenticate to OneDrive account

trans-unit.source: OneDrive needs you to sign in again.
trans-unit.target: Sie müssen sich erneut bei OneDrive anmelden.
trans-unit.note: Error description: the user should manually sign in to their OneDrive account

trans-unit.source: Open sign-in page in private web browser mode
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
No comment provided by engineer.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium will assign file synchronization to the app of your storage provider. Some apps work better than others.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium weist die Dateisynchronisierung der App Ihres Speicheranbieters zu. Einige Apps funktionieren besser als andere.
trans-unit.note: Description of the `Integration via Files app` sync method.
Action: connect to a network server
Title: connection to a network storage
Name of an input field for entering the password again
Call to action (protect the app from unauthorized access)

trans-unit.target: Schützen Sie KeePassium vor unbefugten Zugriffen.
trans-unit.note: Description of `Activate app protection` call to action.
Settings switch: whether AppLock is allowed to use Touch ID/Face ID. Example: 'Use Touch ID'. [biometryTypeName: String]

trans-unit.source: Ensures KeePassium is locked after you force-close the app or restart the device.
trans-unit.target: Stellt sicher, dass KeePassium gesperrt ist, nachdem Sie die App geschlossen oder das Gerät neu gestartet haben.
trans-unit.note: Explanation for the `Lock on App Launch` setting
Setting switch: whether to lock the app after it was terminated and relaunched.
Settings: subtitle of the `App Protection` section. biometryTypeName will be either 'Touch ID' or 'Face ID'. [biometryTypeName: String]
Settings: subtitle of the `App Protection` section when biometric auth is not available.
Settings section: protection of the app from unauthorized access
A description/subtitle for Settings/AppLockTimeout options that trigger when the user has been idle for a while. For example: 'AppLock Timeout: 3 seconds (After last interaction)
A description/subtitle for Settings/AppLock/Timeout options that trigger when the app is minimized. For example: 'AppLock Timeout: 3 seconds (After leaving the app)
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'App Lock: Timeout: Immediately'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'App Lock: Timeout: Never'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'App Lock: Timeout: Immediately'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'App Lock: Timeout: Never'
Action that opens system settings or instructions

trans-unit.source: Before first use, you need to activate AutoFill in system settings.
trans-unit.target: Vor der ersten Verwendung müssen Sie das automatische Ausfüllen in den Systemeinstellungen aktivieren.
trans-unit.note: Description for the AutoFill setup instructions
Title of an option: copy one-time password to clipboard when using AutoFill
Title of a help article on how to activate AutoFill.

trans-unit.source: AutoFill is not available in KeePassium for Intune.
trans-unit.target: Automatisch ausfüllen ist in KeePassium für Intune nicht verfügbar.
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.

trans-unit.target: Fügt das perfekte Ergebnis automatisch ein
trans-unit.note: Title of an option: automatically use the single best match found by AutoFill search
Title of AutoFill settings screen
Option in settings: whether to open the last used database automatically on start.
Confirmation dialog message to delete all backup files
An option in Settings. Please keep it short. Will be shown as 'Keep Backup Files: Forever'
Action to delete all backup files from the app. `ALL` is in capitals as a highlight. [backupFileCount: Int]
Status message: there are no backup files to delete

trans-unit.id: [Settings/ClearKeyFileAssociations/Cleared/text] Associations between key files and databases have been removed.
trans-unit.source: Associations between key files and databases have been removed.
trans-unit.target: Die Verknüpfungen zwischen Schlüsseldateien und Datenbanken wurden entfernt.
trans-unit.note: Text of the success message for `Clear Key File Associations` button
Title of the success message for `Clear Key File Associations` button

trans-unit.id: [Settings/ClearMasterKeys/Cleared/text] All master keys have been deleted.
trans-unit.source: All master keys have been deleted.
trans-unit.note: Text of the success message for `Clear Master Keys` button
Title of the success message for `Clear Master Keys` button

trans-unit.id: [Settings/ClipboardTimeout/description] When you copy some text from an entry, the app will automatically clear your clipboard (pasteboard) after this time.
trans-unit.source: When you copy some text from an entry, the app will automatically clear your clipboard (pasteboard) after this time.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie etwas kopieren, wird KeePassium Ihre Zwischenablage nach dieser Zeit automatisch löschen.
trans-unit.note: Description of the clipboard/pasteboard timeout.
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Clipboard Timeout: Never'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Clipboard Timeout: Never'
Setting switch: whether to lock databases after device reboot.
Subtitle for `Data Protection` section in settings
Settings section: protection of databases, their keys and data inside them
Title of a settings section: backup of databases

trans-unit.id: [Settings/DatabaseLockTimeout/description] If you are not interacting with the app for some time, the database will be closed for your safety. To open it, you will need to enter its master password again.
trans-unit.source: If you are not interacting with the app for some time, the database will be closed for your safety. To open it, you will need to enter its master password again.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie länger nicht mit der App interagieren, wird die Datenbank zu Ihrer Sicherheit geschlossen. Um sie zu öffnen, müssen Sie ihr Master-Passwort erneut eingeben.
trans-unit.note: Description of the Database Lock Timeout
A description/subtitle for the 'DatabaseLockTimeout: Immediately'.
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Database Lock: Timeout: Immediately'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Database Lock: Timeout: Never'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Database Lock: Timeout: Immediately'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Database Lock: Timeout: Never'
Title of a setting: the time after which databases will be locked.
An option in Group Viewer settings. Will be shown as 'Entry Subtitle: None', meanining that no entry details will be shown in any lists.
Title of a settings section: which entry field to show along with entry title
Title of a settings section: sort order of groups and entries in a list
Title of list view configuration screen

trans-unit.source: This feature is blocked by your organization.
trans-unit.target: Diese Funktion wird von Ihrer Organisation blockiert.
trans-unit.note: Notification when corporate user tries to use a feature forbidden by organization's IT department.

trans-unit.source: This setting is managed by your organization.
trans-unit.target: Diese Einstellung wird von der Organisation verwaltet.
trans-unit.note: Notification when corporate user tries to change an app setting controlled by organization's IT department.

trans-unit.source: Allow KeePassium to make network connections to external services?
trans-unit.target: KeePassium erlauben, Netzwerkverbindungen zu externen Diensten herzustellen?
trans-unit.note: Confirmation dialog message
Settings section: how/whether the app is allowed to use networks/Internet
Description of the `Stay Offline` mode.
Setting option: the app should work offline
Description of the `Allow Network Access` mode.
Setting option: the app is permitted to use online features
Action/button which resets some settings to their default state.
Section title in settings
Title of the app settings screen
List sorting option (for file names). Example: 'Sort by: Name'
List sorting option, when no sorting is selected. Example: 'Sort by: None'
List sorting option, when items are manually ordered by the user. Example: 'Sort order: Custom'
Name of a cloud storage service
Name of a cloud storage service
Name of a cloud storage service
Name of a cloud storage service. Must match Microsoft's translation, see https://partner.microsoft.com/solutions/onedrive-for-business
Title of a file storage service option (for example: Dropbox, OneDrive, Other Services)
Template text of a bug report email
Name of an entry field. Acronym `TOTP` should not be translated.

trans-unit.target: Helfen Sie uns, KeePassium zu verbessern!
trans-unit.note: Call to action in the Donations screen.

trans-unit.target: Helfen Sie uns, KeePassium zu optimieren!
trans-unit.note: Call to action in the Donations screen.

trans-unit.target: Helfen Sie uns, KeePassium weiterhin kostenlos anbieten zu können!
trans-unit.note: Call to action in the Donations screen. (free = gratis)
Text in the Donations screen.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium is a free open-source app. You trust it with your most sensitive information. There are no ads, no spying, no nonsense — we respect you.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium ist eine kostenlose Open-Source-App. Sie können uns selbst Ihre sensibelsten Daten anvertrauen. Es gibt keine Werbung, keine Datenspionage, keinen Unsinn – wir respektieren Sie und Ihr Recht auf Datenschutz.
trans-unit.note: Text in the Donations screen.

trans-unit.source: Do you like KeePassium but don't need the premium features?
trans-unit.target: Ihnen gefällt KeePassium, aber Sie benötigen die Premiumfunktionen nicht?
trans-unit.note: Text in the Donations screen.
Notification after a successful donation.
Title of the tip box/donation screen.
Call to action, title of the tip box/donation screen.
Human-readable file location. Example: 'File Location: Remote server'
Human-readable file location. The file is situated either online / in cloud storage, or on the same device, but in some other app. Example: 'File Location: Cloud storage / Another app'
Human-readable file location: the file is on device, inside the app sandbox. 'Backup' is a dedicated directory for database backup files. Example: 'File Location: Internal backup'

Human-readable file location: the file is on device, inside the app sandbox. 'Inbox' is a special directory for files that are being imported. Can be also 'Internal import'. Example: 'File Location: Internal inbox'
Human-readable file location: the file is on device, inside the app sandbox. Example: 'File Location: Local copy'
Selector choice: don't use YubiKey to encrypt/decrypt database
Call for action: insert YubiKey 5Ci to the Lightning port
Call for action: touch the sides of YubiKey 5Ci to continue
Selector choice: use YubiKey to encrypt/decrypt database. For example: `Use YubiKey Slot 1`. [slotID: Int]
